text: Gladwell is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *David Gladwell (born 1935), British film editor and director *Malcolm Gladwell, Canadian writer *Nathan Gladwell, British actor *Robbie Gladwell, British rock and blues guitarist *Rodney Gladwell (1928–1979), British artist *Shaun Gladwell (born 1972), Australian contemporary artist
title: Gladwell (surname)
